website_summaries.verdict: If you're new to blood flow restriction training, get in the game with these easy-to- fasten, easy-to-release bands.
pros: Includes pair of bands so you can exercise both arms or legs at the same time
Lets you lift less and gain more mass
Patented bands are comfortable and easy to strap up
Effortless to release between sets or exercises
Elastic loop to keep slack in place
cons: Buckle can pinch your skin, so consider wearing over a shirt

customer_reviews.title: CERTIFIED BANDS.. MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: These bands are soooo good. Too good. After a good pump I see the lifts. They're super comfortable barely feel like I'm wearing it but be mindful to start off w/ where you're comfortable. The straps itself doesn't hang , it comes w/ a loop to stick the hanging of the band like a belt basically. I don't have any dislikes, . I definitely recommend this for anyone trying to see better results in the gym. Blood flow resistance is new to me but I'm glad I get to experience it w/ brf bands 💪🏾. Awesome job , keep striving for progression
customer_reviews.author: Francia

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: These are a gimmick product. I am not saying that blood restriction training aka occlusion training does not work, these just don't actually work as advertised. As someone with a 19 inch arm your would think tension would not be hard to achieve while wearing these, well no matter how tight i fastened these bands after several uses, and confirmation that i was properly using them: ineffective, no added pump...just a total gimmick. They are far too elastic, and as a result cannot achieve the proper amount of restriction. Again, do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: These are durable. But, not for us leg day girls. I have 26 inch thighs, and the width, and grip are lacking. I’m not the girl to wear booty shorts to the gym. I like my Virus leggings. They slip and slide all over and lose compression rather easily. These need to be thicker and longer, and a way to have them grip on legging material way better. While they do wrap with room to spare, they just don’t hold their compression enough for me, because of the slipping around.
customer_reviews.author: ShannonDaly

customer_reviews.title: Two Weaknesses: Elasticity and Buckle Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't able to get the magical pump that many reviewers mentioned. I believe this is because the material these bands are made from stretches too much. I cinched these things so tight, I had marks on my arms the following day. Which leads to my next point: the buckle is cumbersome and I think some other mechanism might work better. I regret not buying the "rigid" version.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: I'm Sold! Blood Flow Restriction Works!
customer_reviews.text: I'm almost 64-years old. I have not worked out with real regularity in some time and I certainly don't lift anywhere near as heavy as I did say 30-years ago. I became aware of the supposedly great muscle/strength enhancing benefits of Blood Flow Restriction and decided to try out these BFR PRO bands. As for increasing muscle size with light weights these bands work! As for increasing strength quickly, they Work Really Well!! As Amazing as it may seem, I am curling 50lb barbells as easily as I curled 35 pounders 17-days ago! Add these bands to your arsenal!
customer_reviews.author: Papa Leroy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not great for women for biceps training, the clips are too large to wear comfortably around the upper arm. Edited to add; and after seeing my initial review the company actually sent me a new set of bands that were smaller and much easier for me to use, at no charge to myself. The new bands do exactly as I needed and gave me a great pump for my biceps workout, and the customer Service could not have been better!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Shapiro

customer_reviews.title: They work as promised
customer_reviews.text: They work as promised. I use resistance bands, not weight, because I work out alone and it is safer. Working with lighter "weight" is useful as it allows for more reps, helps to maintain form and I am seeing results. I have two sets and the only comment I have is that one of the sets does not have the numbers printed on them to aid in tension adjustment . Update: 10/1/2018 Crazy!!! I got a package in the mail today with a new set with the numbers for adjustment. Crazy super customer service. Makes me want to find out what else these guys sell!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: A little finicky but they definitely work. Not one of those stupid workout gimmicks. The weight I can lift with these on drops tremendously. It tires me out faster too. My biceps have gotten a little bigger as well.
customer_reviews.author: Shae Athelwolf

customer_reviews.title: Questionable quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these bands in July and was excited to use them. After about 1 month of regular use there was noticable wear on the bands wjere the clamps pinch the material and finally the buckles now periodically pop out at the pivot point looks like its a mix of ether the plastic wearing down or the clamp housing streching out. Buyer beware, product looks good initially but for the price it does not last. My advice to the seller is replace the clamps with something like steel or aluminum and thicken the bands.
customer_reviews.author: BrittanyP

customer_reviews.title: THE ARM GODS ARE PLEASED.
customer_reviews.text: The arm gods demand a sacrifice for fruitful gainz. I've historically had a hard time getting my arms sore for 6 years. My second time using these my arms are almost non-operational. I put them on my legs for squats at 135lb (super light) and by the 3rd set i was wobbling trying to stand up. My only criticism is there's no fine tune way to tighten or loosen. Id recommend the company look at tourniquets and mimic the plastic bar to complement the system.
customer_reviews.author: Customer 117

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The idea of the band band works but the quality and durability sucks. I’ve only used the bands 5 to 6 times and they are ripping apart already. I wouldn’t waste my money again on this company. Maybe the other companies have better quality!
customer_reviews.author: Parker

customer_reviews.title: These are built to last and allow otherwise difficult to control exercises the same benefit with safer weights.
customer_reviews.text: They are built to last and they are cheaper than Velcro straps such as you can buy at Walmart and which weal out after a few months of use. They These BFR bands come with a complete and thorough video on exactly how to use them. I use BFR at the end of each workout and I use them for exercises that have a high risk of injury if done with heavy weights; e.g. inclined dumbbell hammer curls that can hurt shoulders if done with heavy weights that are difficult to control.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B. Vincelette Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!  It works as advertised!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the BFR Bands exactly one month ago and couldn't be more pleased with the product and support. The bands are top notch quality and come with a PDF File with very detailed instructions on how to use the bands. I had a couple follow up questions early on and I typically received a response minutes later - and not some "spin" - clear, concise directions on WHAT to do and HOW to do it. Most importantly, the RESULTS. I wanted to wait a month to see if they work as advertised and they do. I made more progress in 30 days than I have with years of P90X. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Garry Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great pump with those that last
customer_reviews.text: Great bands they do work and give you massive pump without using heavy weights. Pump in your arms will be great and you will feel it long after you done. I use them during most of my exercises that involve even partial use of triceps or biceps for example ( dumbell row, pull downs, pull ups, shoulder press, chest press and many more). You can use them for legs too but I haven't tired that option yet so I can't comment on that. Definitely worth the money. FYI focus on reps not the weight. I do between 15-20reps ( recommend supersets).
customer_reviews.author: SPARTAN

customer_reviews.title: Quality Comfortable Bands
customer_reviews.text: I have only started to use these bands so I cannot comment on the results obtained from using them, but I can say that I am very impressed with the quality and comfort of the bands. They are well made, wide bands with easy to use effective clamps to hold the band tension. Because they are designed to work for both arms and legs they are fairly long and thus have a lot of extra band when used for arms, but that's not a problem and there is an added elastic band on the bands to tuck the slack into. I would recommend these BFR bands to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Chris F.

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: I have received the bands and have already included them into my normal workouts, the first day was leg day and I noticed a difference right away, at first your legs feel heavy and almost numb like they are asleep, after the workout I felt it as soon as a started walking down steps, the bands are amazing! It’s like I just lifted a lot of weight, you normally don’t feel sore like that till the next day! Or after lifting a lot of weight for an hour, this was a 30 minute workout! Then next day was chest and triceps, my arm muscles were popping by the end! I am very happy with with product
customer_reviews.author: ITechNate

customer_reviews.title: Good for arms, too small for legs
customer_reviews.text: These are great if you want to work your arms. They’ll easily fit over them and then you can do a couple of light 20 rep sets to feel a huge pump. The main problem with them is that they are not long enough to fit over your legs. For reference, my legs are 25 inches in radius. I would love to be able to do some light squats or lunges with these but there just isn’t enough length to get them around. I could really tighten them to get them onto my legs but then they are just too tight and I have a feeling that for other men, these will be a no go for legs as well.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Bean

customer_reviews.title: It’s All About The Pump
customer_reviews.text: I’m 62 years old. So far I’ve only used the bands a few times. I can say without all certainty that it’s been quite awhile since I’ve gotten a pump in my arms like I do when using these bands. Obviously the pump is greater when doing curls. But I’m impressed with the fact that I’m getting a pump in my arms when doing chest.
customer_reviews.author: FrankZ

customer_reviews.title: Good quality build and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Got this to exercise arms due to rotator cuff injury. Definitely makes the workout with light weights harder due to the restricted blood flow, and much easier on the shoulder with the lighter weight. Hopefully I will maintain my strength whilst my shoulder recovers as research suggests. As for the quality of the product, its built well, the wide band is comfortable and the clasp holds well without interference in either leg or arm exercises. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Darian Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Bigger gluteals.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing results with these bands. My gluteus are bigger and higher 👍
customer_reviews.author: linda kuglarz

customer_reviews.title: Take your workout to the next level
customer_reviews.text: This product was new to me so I did some extensive research and was intrigued. These bands, when applied correctly will allow you to lift a lighter weight, produce a larger pump and help build muscle. Their website was easy to navigate. Also, there are instructional videos on how to use this product properly which was a nice touch. The product itself is well constructed and built to last. The bands are soft, sturdy and pliable. The buckle holds the band in position and is very stout. The bands do as advertised and allows me to lift lighter weights for higher reps without fear of doing any muscle damage. Great overall product and experience!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Shockney

customer_reviews.title: Warning! This product could injure you! Updated!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how this product received so many 5 stars because the design is terrible! The band pinches your skin when you tighten it. Update: The company responded to my initial review by sending another set of bands. These have curved edges and do not pinch! Compared to the thinner cheaper brands, which is difficult to control, these new thick models constrict without cutting off the blood supply by gently pulling it. Kudos to BFR!
customer_reviews.author: Scott B. Chun

customer_reviews.title: Great bands for exploring BFR training
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the bands for about 2 weeks now and love them. The ease of use, combined with the numbering system for consistent tracking, is excellent. It only took a couple of sessions to dial in my preferred settings for upper vs lower body, and any adjustments can easily be made on the fly. Overall, I'm really happy I purchased these bands as an initial foray into the world of BFR.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great workout gear to have
customer_reviews.text: Great Product!, So far I have used it for 2 weeks (since April 17th, 2017) and I like it. Its great for reps till failure and warming up my body. I followed the instructions by T-Nation and used these BFR bands for 50% volume high reps(15+) for Biceps and I definitely felt the pump. I also used it for Barbell benching, which helped me warm up pretty good to do heavier weights.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Invest in a better quality product
customer_reviews.text: Cheap occlusion bands that are difficult to get tight enough because thickness is too big and the elastic stretches too much over the locking lever. Can’t get it to cut off the return flow - only bought these because Lifting Labs wouldn’t deliver. Recommend going with them, used to have a pair a few years ago and they were amazing. Will have to wait to get back to the states or have someone mail me a set because these did not meet my expectation even partially unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Kilroy

customer_reviews.title: Gave me a super pump
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these bands for about 3 weeks now. My first day using them I got sore from my workout. I had not been sore from an arm day in months. So that made me super excited about the gains to come! I only used them once on my legs. They barely fit but I have 23 inch thighs which is quite big. So they were great for my arms. Not quite big enough for my legs.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Winfree

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it’s actually working but I’m trying anyway. I use the on my glutes. Can fit anywhere. Easy to adjust. Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth k.

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: They really work well. The only complaint I had was that the version I received did not have the numbers and marks on them to get both close to the same tightness. Well, they are now sending me the newer version for free. Can't beat that. They seem to be good quality also. They have not slipped any when tight. They have become pretty regular in my workouts.
customer_reviews.author: ash

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I have a MS in exercise physiology, was an athletic trainer at a major PAC 12 University, have been studying strength training for over 35 years, and an avid lifter. Unfortunately I find your product to be unable to deliver the results I had hoped to get. The bands are unable to achieve the needed compression (even with selective pressure pads added) without the help of a partner. One must take special care to aviud pinching your skin while tightening. quality materials but not worth the money, I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: The clasps on these bands are so uncomfortable that I couldn’t even wear them. You have to tighten the straps in order for them to work for BFR training. I returned them after a couple uses of them (the clasps) digging into my skin.
customer_reviews.author: A. Robles

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but could be better
customer_reviews.text: The work as advertised but they are difficult to tighten and latch, especially on your dominate arm. You pretty much have to pull tight, hold and then close the latch with your chin. On two occasions I've suffered a nasty pinch when my skin got caught in the buckle. I would skip these and look for a set with friction-style, pull to tighten buckle.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy R. Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Great product and aids in growth.
customer_reviews.text: These were a little big for my biceps so mainly use these for my legs. I bought the sturdy pair for arms. Definitely noticed a pump and gradual increase in my bicep size - legs too. Remain hopefully that I will continue to add size/growth.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: They work.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using them like they’re supposed to be used and I definitely feel them working. For example, I normally do incline bench press with the 75lb dumbbells 4 sets 10 reps, and that usually leaves me with shoulder pain. With these, I was doing 4 sets of 30,15,15,15, and they left me feeling way more tired.
customer_reviews.author: P Estradar

customer_reviews.title: No joke. It's real.
customer_reviews.text: I could do no more than 2 sets of 10 reps with these bands on with 35 pounders. I now feel like I worked out with 6 sets up to 65 pounds like I did 3 days ago. Real burn. Total muscle failure. I'd imagine good results. We will see. It feels effective. No need to put them on super tight. Just enough to feel some restriction to your blood flow.
customer_reviews.author: Vance

customer_reviews.title: Tentatively pleased
customer_reviews.text: I am new to BFR training, so I cannot definitely say if it works. That said theses bands are super easy to put on an tighten. When I work out with them as described I get a mega pump. They seem to be most effective for biceps and triceps for the arms and glutes and legs. If you are going to try BRR training these seemed to be the best bang for the buck for me at least.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great service.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't watch the how-to video and over-tightened the first time I used it. The lever popped off and was lost in my crowded garage. I contacted the seller and he sent another set immediately, no charge, and directed me to the video on the product page that explained how to use. Outstanding customer service. Don't over-tighten. The pump expands your arms into the band. And don't worry, if the lever does come off and you can find it, it pops right back in again.
customer_reviews.author: KJ Charveax

customer_reviews.title: Why lift heavy?
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a way to build lean muscle mass and improve my overall physique. We a told that lifting heaving weights with multiple sets and low reps was the way to go...for some okay. But lifting heavy weights requires training partners that are unreliable and trainers which can be expensive. I wasn’t willing to gamble on either. BFR is the way to go, the pump is real and I am confident I am heading toward my goals!
customer_reviews.author: Karari Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to any fitness toolbox
customer_reviews.text: This product is a must have for fitness enthusiasts and trainers! I have used wraps in the past but they simply are not as fast, efficient, or effective as the BFR bands. My one rep max on deadlift is around 550 right now and I did tempo reps on the hex bar with 135 for 10! My legs were pumped up after that! I was very pleased with the product and the timeliness of the delivery Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: These bands are GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: These bands are great. Just so you know, the actual bands are very long on them to accommodate arms and legs. I use them only for arms so I custom cut them for the proper length and it works much better not having all the excess band flopping all over the place. Since I have got these my brother has got them too and it just as satisfied as I am with the product. I would definitely recommend for people to get this product. When used properly, it is a great way to gain lean muscle.
customer_reviews.author: code99kid

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for the past 4 weeks. My initial objective was to use them to help me rehab an Achilles repair. I've seen more improvement since using them in this last month than I did prior. Also, if you're looking to use them for a great arm pump, then these are fantastic! Easy to put on with one hand and easy tight tighten to your desired level.
customer_reviews.author: alex Magdaleno

customer_reviews.title: Careful not to snag arm skin putting these on
customer_reviews.text: Basically you should put it on before you get to the gym because the struggle can be annoying. Once you match up the numbers, you can start the workout. I did feel a difference after the workout felt more pumped and vascular but I’m assuming it’s temporary. Will is an update next month maybe when I get the hang of it and have a 6 week trail
customer_reviews.author: LARRY P

customer_reviews.title: effective and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to look for the different sizes! Small people/little arms will need the smaller size. Body builders/LEGS will need the larger size and stronger banding material; don't buy the small/light pair for Legs. Great Customer Service here!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert L.

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR LEGS, just arms!
customer_reviews.text: It says they’re for both arms and legs but actually they’re just for arms. You need the thicker 3 in ones for legs. I wish I new this before because I specifically bought them for and have only been using them on my legs. I feel kinda jipped to be honest. Too late to send them back now...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value for a High Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the bands for about a month now and I couldn't be more pleased. The quality is excellent in that the bands hold their resistance at a consistent level. I've found them particularly useful in changing up my training regimen. I've been mixing in the BFR training with my regular routine and it's been a much needed boost to my training. I am seeing some results in the arms but other body parts are getting some benefit as well. As a person with an undergraduate degree in Exercise Science, I find occlusion training to be very helpful to keep a fresh approach to training. Excellent product and well worth the cost. Very good support as well.
customer_reviews.author: Deacon Dave

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: Got Pro set for arms and the stretchy/velcro set for legs. After an upperbody workout I finished with the vanity muscles and the straps on and could immediately tell how quickly my arms were fatiguing. Great pump from light weight Still working on getting the leg straps on correctly, but I'm sure they'll work fine once I figure out the right way. Excited to see the results with those as I have limited ROM from an ACL surgery that I'm still rehabbing and being able to use lighter weights and still be able to build muscle is an exciting prospect
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian Domenech

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I am definitely enjoying using these Occlusion bands
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I am definitely enjoying using these Occlusion bands. I've been experimenting with tightness. One thing I've definitely noticed is that my biceps are sore after using which is a plus. The bands are well built and the only negative thing I've noticed from the 3 times I've used these are that the buckle will sometimes pinch my skin and I have to readjust the bands. Not a deal breaker at all. Loving the pump I'm getting.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID ANDERSON

customer_reviews.title: Not up to the chore
customer_reviews.text: I've been using elastic wrist wraps for arm BFR training and needed something better and larger for leg BFR. Unfortunately these training bands have soft elastic which is not strong enough for leg occlusion training. I also dislike the seat-belt style closure. Plain velcro would be much easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Warner

customer_reviews.title: Great for new BFR users
customer_reviews.text: So far so good although the bands seem to be showing some kinking from use. I am happy overall and intend to update my review after more uses. So far I've used them about 6 times. Atm I recommend these bands as a starting point for BFR training.
customer_reviews.author: Marcel Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality product
customer_reviews.text: This product delivers. Excellent quality materials and workmanship. I have only used it for my arms so far - it is a very different experience to see your arms swell up so much during light curls. In truth, I have only had temporary pumps, and I have not experienced any permanent growth yet, but I am hopeful. Highly recommended if you are interested in trying occlusion training.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D., Westfield, NJ

customer_reviews.title: Unscrupulous Seller with Misleading Ads
customer_reviews.text: One manufacturer is posting too many different types of band creating artificial competition. Only realised this after receiving it and viewing the introduction video link with the package which shown the premium product as how to use the band and it’s difference in the operation. The premium product has an Spring catch which simplified the tightening the band whereas the product sold does not. Hope buyers beware!
customer_reviews.author: John Chan

customer_reviews.title: I used them just the other day to train biceps ...
customer_reviews.text: I used them just the other day to train biceps. They worked real well for the occlusion process. The only knock I have on them is the slack band. It is somewhat difficult to tuck in the excess. And once you have them tightened down. I want to get right to work. But maybe with practice, and some ingenuity on my part. I will work out this kink.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great For Older Lifters.
customer_reviews.text: I'm an old weight lifter from the 70's who hasn't had a pump in years due to three blood pressure tables a day. I tried the BFR Bands for the first time last week. Worked great with a great pump. I did my regular bicep routine and used the BFR Bands as a finisher/burn sets. I did 6 sets on the preach bench. My biceps was sore for two days.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Thompson

customer_reviews.title: These bands will definitely increase how productive your workouts are
customer_reviews.text: It's too early to tell if they are actually working, but it certainly feels like they are working. These things kick my butt from the start of the workout, meaning my workout doesn't have to be near as long to be productive. They also require much less weight, so I can take them anywhere with a couple light dumbbells and still get a workout in.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle H

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: These bands feel great while workingout. I can definately feel the difference and it allows me to workout with lighter weights and still get that heavy weight feel. As a person with hand grip issues this makes a HUGE difference to me! My hands do not give out on me as fast and this allows me to work out longer before muscle failure. Only time will tell if they make a difference visually. I will post an update soon..... I do recommend highly!
customer_reviews.author: Gee j.

customer_reviews.title: A Must for Every Gym Goer
customer_reviews.text: These bands are incredible. I am a trainer and PT student and use these bands religiously. There is an incredible amount of research showing the benefits of BFR training and the applications are endless! It’s essentially a way to trick your bodies physiology to get increased muscle growth and gains. This product is perfect for athletes, injured individuals, and the older adult population. I would recommend them to anyone! Just please do a little research and follow the protocols for use (lighter loads and do not wear them longer than 10-15 minutes etc.). Overall, you can’t beat the effectiveness of this product, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feels like it helps
customer_reviews.text: These bands are very tough and seem to be pretty good quality in general. I did have some issues with the plastic portion pinching my skin when I tightened it but it did not happen again because I was more aware. There are the extra holes for the bands but the video didn't really seem to explain that you could use it. I used it for my legs and it I felt a difference. Overall, it is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Joemar Buyao

customer_reviews.title: great for ancillary work
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Gives you a great pump and fatigues your muscles quickly. I found you have to cut back on the weight and greatly increase the reps and sets with minimum rest in between sets. I use these as finishing exercises after heavier lifts. Shoot for 4-5 sets of 30 reps with no more than a minute rest. And be prepared to feel the burn.
customer_reviews.author: HXen

customer_reviews.title: you'll feel the workout tomorrow
customer_reviews.text: My friend and i often workout together, he's a physical science major, so I pretty much just do the workout he recommends. He brought up BFR bands and how soar he was after he used them once. Needless to say they work well, that being said I've only have used them 10 times, in the two weeks I've had them. The quality seems top notch but definitely a solid buy. They also come with a really useful ebook.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm only used the bands a couple times but so far I like them!! I'm dont have access to a gym right now so I'm not lifting heavy weight!! The bands allow me to get a better pump while utilizing lighter weights!! They fit on the legs very well and I'm working on wrapping them better on the arm since it's a smaller width for sturdiness!! Overall I approve so far!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J Harris

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE!!!
customer_reviews.text: THESE THINGS ARE A WASTE ON MONEY!!! THESE WILL NOT STAY IN PLACE. DO NOT PURCHASE!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Solter

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking to get the deep burn, look no further.
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of articles on BFR training before purchasing these. They are very well made and easy to put on. The instructional video is extremely helpful. I’m amazed at how fatigued my arms get with only 10lb weights. The markings on the bands make it easy to know how much to tighten them once you figure out the proper pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph T Jackowski

customer_reviews.title: Great product, a little short for legs
customer_reviews.text: I like the product a lot, I have pretty thick legs though and need slightly longer ones so when using them and releasing the slack they dont just fall off. The owner contacted me and said they would send the longer ones, as soon as i get those and test them out, if they work the same way it's a 5 star product. Owner sent me the longer ones as well. 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: William B.

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to training
customer_reviews.text: I love these BFR bands. I’ve been using them for legs and arms about a year and have seen big gains. They work especially good for me, since I have restricted mobility and limited strength in my right arm, so I can get a good workout using the lighter weight that I can manage. I can put these bands on myself and they stay securely tight and in place during my workout. They have held up well for a year and I don’t see any need to replace them soon. I strongly recommend blood flow restriction training to anyone - just do a little research about how to incorporate it into your routine and you’ll be glad you did!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew W

customer_reviews.title: LIFE CHANGING
customer_reviews.text: My workouts have changed so much since I’ve started using these bands. I get such a good pump and feel my glutes activate in a way they didn’t before. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Canales

customer_reviews.title: defective at first use, great service support
customer_reviews.text: I decide to go with this bands for quality and good reviews, but after the first use this get defective as you can see at the picture, and the pump is not so good as my previous bands. Update 11.30.2018 After my damaged bands, they shipped a new one pair of bands free of charge, this time the Pro version, that are awesome! Great pumping! So rated 5 star
customer_reviews.author: Luis Asabá

customer_reviews.title: Works, but you look dumb as hell.
customer_reviews.text: You are gonna look like a complete retard standing there grunting as you struggle to curl 15's when you start using these, but your biceps will get completely annihilated. BFR seems to live up to the hype, and i have seen great gains using these.
customer_reviews.author: shiggles

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad product but not what I was expecting either
customer_reviews.text: I've owned these bands now for a few weeks and have used them for the upper and lower body in the gym. I liked the pump and the tightness of them and they did seem to work well that way. What I didn't like was that they are not that easy to put on with one hand and they are barely big enough to go around my thighs for legs which I do not think are huge but maybe bigger than the average.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Getting ready for a plump booty
customer_reviews.text: My girl friend that works with a plastic surgeon uses these and says her butt is looking amazing she cant beleive the difference and her honest opinion means alot so I ordered, they quality is great..
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Big time difference.
customer_reviews.text: This is very effective in cutting time in half while maintaining effectiveness in your training. Best when you cycle it between moderate to light training or working around soreness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are absolutely fantastic. Prior to ordering these
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely fantastic. Prior to ordering these, I purchased some rubber occlusion bands which worked, but were a pain to wrap and keep in place. No wrapping needed - just pull the straps tight, lock them down and you're good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin K

customer_reviews.title: These bands are great. I’m a generally lean guy
customer_reviews.text: These bands are great. I’m a generally lean guy, and was discouraged that though I keep upping my weight and eating well, etc, my post gym pump was plateau-ing. One session with these bands and not only did I use lighter weights, but my biceps swelled extremely noticeably, kept twitching a good half hour after I left the gym, and are holding really well. I’m really pleased that I purchased these bands and can’t wait to see how I progress over the next week. Definitely recommend to anyone looking to add some size and try something new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not using it anymore
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the product is good. I have also purchased the other version of this occlusion band from the same manufacturer. It is overpriced for what it really is. In terms of use, not only completely useless, but also potentially harmful from the medical, clinical point of view. Not planning to use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bfr bands are legit and I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.text: Great bands fit well. Not comfortable but it's not for comfort. Gets the job done. Pumps feel great and last quite a bit longer on legs vs arms. The strap gets in the way when done tightening it. Unless your the guy in the picture with no shirt on and just bands. #goals.
customer_reviews.author: mr.bigs12

customer_reviews.title: wow
customer_reviews.text: got this for my shoulder, and the difference is like night and day. They came well packaged, and appears to be well made. I use them every day, twice a day and they've held up very well. will most certainly buy again.
customer_reviews.author: zefo

customer_reviews.title: Product folds, but still very useful
customer_reviews.text: I love this product overall! Noticed a big difference in my workouts, only down fall is they aren’t thick enough to not fold. So they did fold after the first use, but I still use them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome muscle pumps.
customer_reviews.text: I use them strictly for my arm exercises because I'm 55 years old and have had lots of elbow joint issues from lifting heavy. This allows the use of lighter weights which alleviates the strain on elbow joints. And I actually get better muscle pumps and results then when not using them. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Deadwoodpete

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to my home gym
customer_reviews.text: Read about BFR bands and thought I’d try them out. Adds a whole new level to my arm training. Definitely noticed and felt the results after the first few times. Highly recommend to anyone serious about their training.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the science, however execution could use some improvement
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to try these out, however the real world application, I’m not so excited about. The bands are super long so there is extra strap hanging and it’s uncomfortable. Perhaps I’m doing something wrong. It’s a bummer because I like the idea and the science.
customer_reviews.author: Janene M Stageberg

customer_reviews.title: Hmmm...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like these but they got all crinkled up and distorted after my first use on a leg day. I have big thighs and a big butt so I think thicker bands might work better for me. I just ordered the Double wrap ones to try out and will now be using these solely for upper body but would love a replacement pair that’s not distorted. Makes it hard to gauge if I am tighten the straps evenly. :( On a positive note, the pump you get from the bands is freakin’ awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila C.

customer_reviews.title: so far, so good
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been able to use them too often to be able to write a review on the product itself, but I will say that the team is amazing! the contacted me to see if I was happy with their poduct. I informed them I had lost the guide on how to use it and they immediately sent me another! the materials the product is made from don't feel out of this world but they are definitely not cheap or uncomfortable. so far, I am happy with my purchase and will update after further use to review the performance/effectiveness of the bands themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin

customer_reviews.title: Best BFR Bands Ever
customer_reviews.text: I don’t really write any reviews but to be honest this is an amazing product. I workout a lot and one thing I love is my arms so I really wanted my veins to be popping out. I looked everywhere for the right product, when I came across the PRO BFR Bands. The first thing i had to see was the reviews, all I saw was really great reviews and how this product works. Personally I love the bands because every time I am wearing them I have an amazing workout, and I love seeing my veins popping out which is why I bought them. Overall, I am really satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: I like how I'm doing my normal routine and i can definitely feel the workout 2x more. Feels great and enjoying these BFR bands. There really is nothing bad i can say about this. My biceps get bigger at the moment and seeing better results as the days/weeks pass.
customer_reviews.author: Gonzalo Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Does Make Your Arms Sore Later After Workout
customer_reviews.text: Works ok, a little difficult to get it on and keep it at the right pressure the whole time, my left arm piece wouldn’t stay tight but got it figured out. My veins weren’t popping out when doing a lot of reps but didn’t use it consistently enough, it will take time to build lean muscle with this with the right confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I was a bit hesitant because of all the warnings about BFR training, but like everything else you gotta try it to see if it’s for you. Me? I was amazed at the vascularity these bands gave me. Along with a pump that lasted for hours! Gonna get a set for my legs!
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by my physical therapist
customer_reviews.text: Bands came quickly and exactly as described. I am absolutely loving the blood flow restriction training! I was a skeptic before, but my physical therapist actually recommended I try it.
customer_reviews.author: Moxie94

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy the Blue pair
customer_reviews.text: If I had it to do over again I'd have the red ones before the blue ones. I was told the red ones are self locking. The blue ones constantly slip and bothers the heck out of me. So glad I wasted my money
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Def noticed a difference
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife and she has used them twice this week. Here is her review: "I definitely noticed a difference in my workouts. I usually feel sore a day or two after working out but with the bands I feel sore minutes after the workout. Besides the bands slipping a little when I am exercising, I absolutely love it and cannot wait to see my results."
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item and I must say that they are fantastic!! Seller is also fantastic you can buy with total confidence from this seller as I will again in the future...... Thank You very much!
customer_reviews.author: William W.

customer_reviews.title: I am highly disappointed after all the positive reviews
customer_reviews.text: The bands do not come with directions for use and how to properly thread the wraps. The wraps do not stay tight while performing exercises. I have tried multiple ways to try and get the bands to stay constricted and not become loose. I am highly disappointed after all the positive reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Christina C.

customer_reviews.title: I love these bands! The pump is real! Very effective.
customer_reviews.text: I read about these bands and decided to give them a try. The pump is real! I’ve noticed a significant difference is my arms and legs after training with these bands. I’m more vascular, less sore and feel like I get a much mote effective workout in less time. Once you figure out the right pressure to use, they’re very effective! Everyone should be using these bands, especially if you travel a lot they are game changers!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy O'Shea

customer_reviews.title: BFR Bands
customer_reviews.text: I'm using the most recent BFR bands 3 times a week and I'm enjoying the elasticity of these bands much more than the rigid BFR bands I initially bought. My current BFR bands are more comfortable due to the elasticity of the bands not to mention that the fabric is more contouring. I hope to see great results!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These bands are excellent. Easy to use and very sturdy. I just added some occlusion training to my workouts, so we'll see how that goes, but the bands are a great addition. And the service from this company was incredibly efficient and prompt.
customer_reviews.author: Steven A. Corso

customer_reviews.title: Need to be consistent
customer_reviews.text: Bands are super stretchy and very durable. There easy to use but I recommend being consistent. These do not work over night but they can produce great results
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Flawed in application
customer_reviews.text: Uneven pressure. More pressure in band on side opposite band from buckle results in uneven circumferential pressure. Some of that is mitigated by double wrapping but overall get better overall pressure with muscle floss from WOD. Got these because muscle floss can be a pain to wrap but get a better BFR workout with the WOD product. These are very easy to put on and adjust but not worth the uneven workout
customer_reviews.author: dwings83

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. Good quality product. The only problem is that one of the bands seems to have the numbers on the wrong side so it can be difficult to see what level I am setting the tightness to.
customer_reviews.author: Austin W.

customer_reviews.title: Big gains
customer_reviews.text: I have always lifted heavy.....after trying these...I realize that it's possible to get more for less! I swear I have made gains in a month just by using these with a little research..they seem to work very well! Wish I knew about these a long time ago! Just make sure u do a little research in order to use them safely.
customer_reviews.author: kevin underhill

customer_reviews.title: Worth!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, help a lot with my training (especially if you have injury before). A little bit discomfort while using it. Great pdf guide and post sale support from the company. Material is good, only been using it twice since i received the product.
customer_reviews.author: SKIR

customer_reviews.title: Great bands
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Comes with an instruction Manuel and workout information. Bands are made of a great material, and sturdy clips. I bought these for my legs .. not realizing they have specific ones for legs and arms. As a personal trainer I am hoping to add this to my clients workouts. Definitely need the legs ones! Product just as described! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: MelCaldwell

customer_reviews.title: Good for arms! Just a bit too small for legs.
customer_reviews.text: Just got these today and hit the gym! They work well around the biceps but I’m definitely going to need a few days to get the perfect tightness. I did have a nice pump after using these though! However, even though today isn’t leg day, I tried them on and they don’t quite fit around my legs :( I figured it would be difficult to fit everyone, but my legs aren’t huge by any means. Overall, good product for arm day, which should be every day.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Bartkowski

customer_reviews.title: Good product, poor construction
customer_reviews.text: The BFR bands work great for my current high Rep low weight regiment. Fatigues the muscle quick and has you pumped. Only used it twice one for legs (upper thigh) and for biceps and triceps.. both experiences were awesome. They are easy to put on yourself but the only thing is the elastic loop that holds the slack is just a little flimsy.. after only two uses one loop is literally being held by 3 stitchings (pic posted). The ebook was emailed a couple of days after I received the BFR bands so as a novice user I just YouTube videos which was very helpful.. the ebook has more a scientific breakdown. Over great product.
customer_reviews.author: TEAM MC

product_meta.title: BFR Bands Occlusion Training Bands, PRO, 1 Set of Bands, Works For Arms OR Legs, Blood Flow Restriction Bands Help Gain Muscle without Lifting Heavy Weights, Strong Elastic Strap + Quick-Release
product_meta.description: These bands are easy to strap up, quick to release as soon as the exercise is completed and exceptionally comfortable on the working limb. They are applied to working limbs and paired with loads of 10-30% of a 1rm in order to achieve lean muscle and great tone quickly without heavy weight-lifting. If you are looking for the best Occlusion Training Bands, buy BFR Bands PRO model. Click "Add to Cart" now!
feature_bullets: EXTRA WIDE BANDS: These Occlusion Bands are extra thick and 2 inches wide to help you reach optimal occlusion during your occlusion training workouts.

INCREASED FACTORS FOR MUSCLE GROWTH: Studies show that practical blood flow restriction training can increase muscle protein synthesis, NOS-1 expression and mTOR signaling, resulting in increased muscle growth.

QUICKER LEAN MUSCLES AND SUPERB TONE WITHOUT LIFTING HEAVY WEIGHTS: The occlusion straps induce hypertrophy at very low loads (usually 10-30% of a 1RM). When performed correctly, the results achieved are typically similar to those achieved with 80% 1RMs.

EXTRA-STRONG AND SUPER-COMFORTABLE: Our patented bands are easy to strap up, effortless to release in between sets or exercises, and exceptionally comfortable. Each order comes with 2 bands to allow you to exercise both legs or both arms at the same time.
